webspider.core.indexer
Class Indexer

java.lang.Object
  webspider.core.indexer.Indexer
All Implemented Interfaces:
myIWSearchEngine
public class Indexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements myIWSearchEngine

This class implements the myIWSearchEngine interface and controls the running of the indexer.

Author:
Kushal D'Souza
